modName: Mage Lake House A magical player home
summary: A large mansion by the lake. Enjoy the unique weapons and funny moments. Beware the cave!
descriptionHtml:
Yes i know Serana is in the first pic but NO this mod ***DOES NOT REQUIRE DAWNGUARD*** 

An old Mage\'s Lake House which you inherited after your great grandfather\'s death in the pit of squirrels (which is a whole other story entirely). 
Its a huge mansion on the lake by the Lady Stone (you\'ll know it when you see it). 
Huge armory with a firing range, Forge area, Big bedroom, and a dock to go out onto the lake. 
But beware, A strange demon is said to lurk in the shadows. 

Screenshots will be up soon. 

Have fun in this new house that i have made. 
There is nothing but peace and tranquility within. 
Remember to rate, favorite, and follow me on the workshop because i will continue to make mods. 
Enjoy

----------------------------------------------

Answers for your questions: 
Where is the demon? 
He is a secret but the guards should direct you towards him. 

Does the door behind the demon open? 
Yes you can now access the area the door leads to. 

Where is it? 
Look at the map in the screenshots at the top of the page. 

How do i download this? 
Download the file in the file tab and follow the installation directions in the readme

Can i hate and troll on this mod? 
Yes but you will be ignored, your comments removed, and blocked if you spam.
author: Dovahcake or Krit Rawkets on Steam
